welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aurora, Philippines! This charming province is known for its stunning natural beauty, including lush forests, pristine beaches, and majestic waterfalls. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Aurora has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Pagadian Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's wifi network for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Labo Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Labo Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
